recommendations.issue: The episodes don't match the project DNA about 'The Accidental Lifeline' story of Tom the motivation coach and Julia the ER doctor.

recommendations.issue: Completely different setting (coffee shop) and characters (Beth and Jake) with no connection to the main storyline.

recommendations.issue: Complete narrative departure with no connection to previous episodes, making the series feel disjointed.
